title: champions just gone?
body: so with the updated client are all my paid for skins and stuff just gone?

replies.body: Nope, the updated client doesn't touch your inventory at all! Are you not seeing your champs and skins listed in champ select or in the **COLLECTION** at the top of the client?
at the time before the update everything was as I left it I chose the upgrade and from that point I haven't seen anything. its as if I just signed up

It looks like you're logging into a Level 1 account. You may have accidentally signed into the wrong account so I'd recommend requesting all usernames tied to your email using our [**Username Recovery Page**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/forgot-username).

Let me know if this helped!
